channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- System Firmware Update Utility (SysFwUpdt) for some Intel(R) Server Boards and Intel(R) Server Systems Based on Intel(R) 621A Chipset
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- System Firmware Update Utility (SysFwUpdt) for some Intel(R) Server Boards and Intel(R) Server Systems Based on Intel(R) 621A Chipset

item.title: CVE-2023-22841|2023-08-11T02:37:06.486Z -- n%2Fa -- system%20firmware%20update%20utility%20%28sysfwupdt%29%20for%20some%20intel%28r%29%20server%20boards%20and%20intel%28r%29%20server%20systems%20based%20on%20intel%28r%29%20621a%20chipset
item.description: Unquoted search path in the software installer for the System Firmware Update Utility (SysFwUpdt) for some Intel(R) Server Boards and Intel(R) Server Systems Based on Intel(R) 621A Chipset before version 16.0.7 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
